# [FEAT] Agent Knowledge Panel

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `collaboration`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement an agent-facing knowledge panel for quick access to help center articles while working on tickets.

## Requirements

### Context Panel
- Knowledge panel in ticket sidebar
- Context-aware article suggestions
- Quick article search
- Article preview
- One-click insert link

### Article Suggestions
- AI-powered suggestions based on ticket content
- Recently used articles
- Most relevant articles
- Article recommendations

### Agent Actions
- Insert article link in reply
- Copy article content
- Flag outdated articles
- Request new articles
- Rate article usefulness

### Article Creation
- Create article from ticket
- Draft articles while working
- Quick publish workflow
- Knowledge capture prompts

### Feedback Loop
- Track which articles help resolve tickets
- Article effectiveness metrics
- Gap identification
- Improvement suggestions

## Zendesk Reference
Agents can use Knowledge in the Context panel for easy access to help center articles, quickly search for and insert links to relevant articles in their replies without leaving the ticket.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Knowledge panel in ticket view
- [ ] Article search works
- [ ] AI suggestions functional
- [ ] Insert article links works
- [ ] Article creation from ticket
